work is more or less the same way
We have people getting the amount of, if not more, hours than they were asking for.

Personally, I'm happy being capped at 3 days a week.  2 days might make money a bit tight since I'd more or less be making the same amount as my expenses, but it would free up more time to learn stuff
But yeah, my manager is wondering if he should hire anyone else at the moment, and I'm like YES.
Suffice to say, Corona is definitely showing how short-sighted most businesses are ;)
